text: The Murder of Travis Alexander was the killing of Travis Alexander by his ex girlfriend, Jodi Arias. Alexander was stabbed and shot to death. In the U.S the case gained much popularity. Arias was sentenced to life in prison for first degree murder. Arias pleaded not guilty because she said it was in self defense. She tried to appeal the verdict and lost on March 24, 2020. ==References== Category:2000s murders in the United States
title: Murder of Travis Alexander
